problem_text_cn: 如图,AB、BC、CD、DA都是⊙O的切线,已知AD=3,BC=6,则AB+CD的值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB, BC, CD, and DA are all tangents of ⊙O. Given that AD = N_0 and BC = N_1, then the value of AB + CD is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵AB、BC、CD、DA都是⊙O的切线,∴可以假设切点分别为E、H、G、F,∴AF=AE,BE=BH,CH=CG,DG=DF,∴AD+BC=AF+DF+BH+CH=AE+BE+DG+CG=AB+CD,∵AD=3,BC=6,∴AB+CD=AD+BC=9,故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查切线的性质、切线长定理等知识,解题的关键是证明圆的外切四边形的对边和相等,属于中考常考题型．
